item.title: Lilia: The Fallen Flower in the Prison City
item.description:
Title: Lilia: The Fallen Flower in the Prison City
Genre: Casual , Indie , RPG
Developer: Acerola
Publisher: Kagura Games
Franchise: Kagura Games
Release Date: Mar 21, 2025




About This Game

When a young adventurer and an elite knight stumble upon a vile conspiracy bigger than either of them, they get captured and dragged off to the prison city of Luxuria, where they must work to earn their keep and some small measure of freedom. While the Kingdom of Freesia advocates for a policy of human and monster equality, Luxuria is a bastion of staunch human supremacists, and the local monsters are being horribly oppressed.

Lilia and Sheryl want to help the monsters to escape, but Lilia is the only one who can safely delve into the Luxuria Hole to find the equipment they'll need to bring their plans to fruition. Meanwhile, somebody has to earn money so they won't get punished when taxes come due every morning. It's up to you to help the two heroines explore the mine and earn their keep if they're going to escape this prison city!

Explore the city to find resources and opportunities to make money, delve into a dungeon with real-time combat, and help the resisting monsters escape from the prison city. Every day you'll spend one shift each playing as Lilia and Sheryl as they work to escape their unjust imprisonment. Lilia is the only person who can safely enter the Luxuria Hole, but that doesn't mean Sheryl has nothing to do, because taxes are due every morning if you don't want to spend the day in the lockup.

You'll gather, craft, battle, and work your way to freedom, all while trying to avoid harsh punishments from the prison city's cruel overseers!

Gather and Craft

If you want to explore the Luxuria Hole, Lilia is going to need weapons. Unfortunately, since this is a prison city, the only ones available are the ones you make yourself, and they're not exactly the most durable. You'll have to regularly gather resources to make new weapons, or you'll find yourself unarmed and vulnerable!

Delve the Dungeon

The Luxuria Hole is a mazelike dungeon full of insane monsters, ore, and abandoned-but-useful technology, but only Lilia can explore it. Delve deep while fighting off enemies in real time, making use of melee and ranged weapons!

Earn Your Keep

Lilia may be busy exploring the dungeon, but she and Sheryl will still have to work together to make sure they can afford to pay their taxes every morning. Work, steal, and sell your way from the red into the black!

System Requirements

Windows

* Starting January 1st, 2024, the Steam Client will only support Windows 10 and later versions.
    Minimum:
    • OS *: Windows® 8/8.1/10/11
    • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
    • Memory: 4 GB RAM
    • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
    • DirectX: Version 9.0
    • Storage: 1 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.
    Recommended:
    • OS *: Windows 11/10/8
    • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
    • Memory: 4 GB RAM
    • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
    • DirectX: Version 9.0
    • Storage: 4 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.

item.title: Stardust Skate
item.description:
Title: Stardust Skate
Genre: Indie , Sports , Strategy
Developer: VchiBan , Aetha
Publisher: VchiBan
Release Date: Mar 21, 2025




About This Game

Blitz through Stardust Valley , experiencing everything from the spooky forest of Blackthorn Mire to the sunny sands of Beachwood -- and more! Perform sick tricks and skillful maneuvers to earn currency to unlock new boards.

Unique Skating Styles

Pick from 4 different skaters of VchiBan with their own unique powers and abilities to find the shredding style that grooves with you~!

Features:

  • 90s inspired visuals

  • Arcade style endless runner

  • Original soundtrack

  • 40+ unique boards to unlock

  • Steam leaderboards

item.title: Look Outside
item.description:
Title: Look Outside
Genre: Adventure , RPG
Developer: Francis Coulombe
Publisher: Devolver Digital
Franchise: Devolver Digital
Release Date: Mar 21, 2025




About This Game

Look Outside is a survival horror RPG set in a single apartment building. A mysterious event turns anyone who looks out the window into grotesque monsters, leaving the world in absolute chaos. Scavenge the building to seek food, supplies, and weapons while encountering strange characters - human and otherwise.

Survival Horror & Resource Management

Plan tense expeditions outside your apartment as you fend off grotesque monsters dwelling in and around your building. Return to your home with gathered resources and partial answers to your questions to recuperate by playing games, making dinner, crafting tools, and getting to know your neighbors turned allies.

Inventive Turn-Based Combat

Clash with over 150 hand-crafted creatures in turn-based combat that accounts for space between you and your foes as you wield makeshift weapons and items you've gathered in the corridors of the building.

Impeccable Body Horror Aesthetic

Meet your macabre fate in a bizarre world teeming with an unconventional and occasionally psychotic cast of characters - some of which you can recruit and offer safe harbor in your apartment as the mystery unravels.

Small, Experimental, and Unwaveringly Weird

Offering 3 - 6 hours of playtime with a dozen boss encounters, friends to recruit, and visitors to invite back to your home, Look Outside offers different experiences for every player on their way to uncover several different endings.





Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

This Game contains content inappropriate for all ages: Horror Scenes, Frequent Violence, and Gore are displayed during gameplay.



System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS *: Windows 7 x64
    • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500 / AMD Phenom II X4 965
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 / Radeon RX 560X
    • Storage: 1 GB available space
* Starting January 1st, 2024, the Steam Client will only support Windows 10 and later versions.

item.title: Urban Jungle
item.description:
Title: Urban Jungle
Genre: Casual , Indie , Simulation
Developer: Kylyk Games
Publisher: Assemble Entertainment
Franchise: Assemble Entertainment
Release Date: Mar 21, 2025




About This Game

Urban Jungle is a charming and relaxing simulation game that invites you to transform small, ordinary apartments into lush, green havens by placing delightful plants with savvy. But no worries, you won’t have to deal with watering or pest control – the plants just need a good spot, and that's enough to create the comfiest and coziest home of them all. Oh, and don’t forget to pet your cat!

  • Decorate with Plants: The core gameplay revolves around arranging a diverse selection of plants in your apartment. Each plant can be placed in different spots, challenging you to find the optimal placement to enhance the room’s coziness and aesthetics.

  • Puzzle Elements: While the game is primarily about decoration, it includes puzzle-like aspects. You’ll need to think strategically about where to place each plant to maximize the comfort and visual appeal of your home, ultimately unlocking new plants.

  • Relaxing Atmosphere: Urban Jungle is designed to be a stress-free experience. There are no time limits or high-pressure scenarios. You can move plants around freely and adjust your setup at your own pace.

  • Environmental Storytelling: The game’s narrative is subtly woven into the environment. As you progress, you’ll uncover pieces of a heartwarming story that unfolds across the different stages of the protagonist's life.

  • Interactive Elements: In addition to plants, you can interact with other items like lamps and humidifiers to alter the ambiance of your apartment, further enhancing the cozy feeling.

Why You'll Love Urban Jungle

Urban Jungle is perfect for players seeking a wholesome and meditative gaming experience. The simple yet engaging gameplay, combined with the delightful visuals and calming music, creates an oasis of tranquility. Whether you’re an avid gardener in real life or someone who simply loves cozy spaces, Urban Jungle offers a beautiful blend of creativity, relaxation, and gentle storytelling.

Immerse yourself in the serene joy of plant decoration, where every decision brings your apartment closer to becoming a perfect green sanctuary.

    • Graphics: GTX 1060
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 1 GB available space

item.title: Iron Saga VS
item.description:
Title: Iron Saga VS
Genre: Action
Developer: Gameduchy
Publisher: Gameduchy
Release Date: Mar 21, 2025




About This Game

With red-hot sparks, laser swords and rocket-propelled fists, a modern Mecha fighting game finally appears! Iron Saga, Game Duchy's mech-themed mobile game, spins off into its Versus version: Iron Saga VS!

As a modern fighting game, it features robust rollback online play.

﻿

=NEW AND CLASSIC MECHA!=

12 powerful mechs are at your disposal to pilot, including some from classic anime series!

﻿ [Mazinger Z series]

  • Mazinger Z

  • Great Mazinger

  • Boss Borot

[Shin Getter Robo Armageddon series]

  • Getter Robo

[Super Beast Machine God Dancouga series]

  • Dancouga

[Iron Saga series]

  • Vassago

  • Kaguya

  • Qing Long

  • Susanoo

  • Mephisto

  • Wu Shuang

  • Nero

﻿

=ARSENAL SYSTEM=

Each of the playable mechs in Iron Saga VS can be outfitted with one of two unique Arsenals , altering their special move list and dramatically changing their gameplay. Will you use Mazinger Z's missile arsenal "Bat A Thousand" or his photon power eye beam charged "Photon Power Commands"?

﻿

= POWERFUL COMBOS AND SUPERMOVES =

Fill your EN bar in combat to use your stronger Energy Moves, take advantage of Flash Counters to unleash powerful combos and unleash your Power Max Supermove to finish your opponent off! But in dire times, you also have access to your Awakening Supermove ... will it be enough to turn the tides of the battle? Many control options also allow for basic combos to be easily accessible to players of all skill levels!

﻿

=ADVENTURE ON WITH YOUR FAVORITE MECHA=

Discover the lore behind your Mecha and its pilot in Arcade Mode, fulfill your missions' objectives in the increasingly challenging Simulacrum Chronicle, learn the best techniques in the Pilot Academy or master your own techniques in the robust Training mode!

﻿

=COMPETE WITH NEW AND OLD FRIENDS=

Fight against an AI or friend offline in the VS mode, or meet online in a public regional or private lobby!

All online play features smooth rollback netcode.

Quickly meet new opponents in either casual or ranked matchmaking. Can you reach the rank of Grandmaster?

﻿

Now get in the robot and fight, Commander!
